attributes.action: stop ANY MORE cuts in the RAF and not scrap 2 more Tornado GR4 squadrons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We understand that the treasury will insist on further reductions in the front line strength of the RAF, namely the scrapping of two Tornado GR4 bomber squadrons.  To do this would be utterly irresponsible as it would jeopardise the defence capability of this country
